channel.title: Interface help [PI 317]

item.title: Interface help [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

so im trying to make a new interface for my server, all it is, is one interface being loaded thru the sprites folder, that shows up when i do a command. could anyone tell me what im doing wrong because it still doesnt show up, heres what ive done:

  1. made the folder to load the sprite within the sprites folder,
  2. added this into RSInterface.java: Troll(textDrawingAreas);
  3. added this into RSInterface.java:

public static void Troll(TextDrawingArea[] tda) {
RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(2650);
addSprite(2651, 0, “/Interfaces/Troll/Troll”);
}

  1. went into server, typed ::interface 2650 and nothing happened.

  2. now im here. can anyone help me figure out what i need to add\what i did wrong? will rep++ for help, thanks in advace, L0lc0pt3r

Read full topic
